sense.name: set up or prepare for use
sense.examples: We installed a new furnace in the basement. Will you help me install this software? The plumber is coming tomorrow to install the new washing machine. They installed the rule to protect students.

sense.name: place or settle someone somewhere (job, place)
sense.examples: We will hold a ceremony to install the new governor. She has installed a couple of young academics as her advisers. She was installed in the English Department. They installer her in the intensive care unit. I've installed myself in the spare room.
